metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42522 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is a Information Disclosure vulnerability in anjuta/plugins/document-manager/anjuta-bookmarks.c. This issue was caused by the incorrect use of libxml2 API. The vendor forgot to call 'g_free()' to release the return value of 'xmlGetProp()'.

criterions.comment: anjuta: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
